 *  map: GameMap - current map          
 *  handler: HeroHomeHandler - current map handler
 *  runner: DemoRunner - the game runner of the project
 *  context: Context - the game context
 */
torch(here);

 *  x: int - the x coordinate of the current tile

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  here: MapPin - the composite object containing current map UID,

 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer

 *  handler: HeroHomeHandler - current map handler
 *  runner: DemoRunner - the game runner of the project
 *  context: Context - the game context
 */
var light = light(here);
light.setPositionOffset(0, 15f);

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  here: MapPin - the composite object containing current map UID, 
 *        layer's index and x,y coordinates of the current tile          
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of the current tile
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of the current tile 
 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer
 *  map: GameMap - current map          
 *  handler: HeroHomeHandler - current map handler

 */
var light = light(here);
light.setPositionOffset(0, 15f);

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of tile the object has been created on
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of tile the object has been created on 
 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer
 *  map: GameMap - current map
 */
warp(here, A.maps.hero_house.main.home);

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  here: MapPin - the composite object containing current map UID, 
 *        layer's index and x,y coordinates of the current tile          
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of the current tile
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of the current tile 
 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer
 *  map: GameMap - current map
 */
friend(here, "grandma")
	.randomMovementAI(4f, here.toCoordinates(), 5)
	.interaction(this::triggerGrandmaDialog);

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  here: MapPin - the composite object containing current map UID, 
 *        layer's index and x,y coordinates of the current tile          
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of the current tile
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of the current tile 
 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer
 *  map: GameMap - current map
 */
friend(here, "neko")
	.randomMovementAI(4f)
	.interaction(this::triggerNekoDialog);

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of tile the object has been created on
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of tile the object has been created on 
 *  layer: ObjectLayer - current object layer
 *  map: GameMap - current map
 *  handler: HeroHomeHandler - current map handler
 *  runner: DemoRunner - the game runner of the project
 *  context: Context - the game context
 */
chest(here, "plain_chest_down")
	.addItem(new MeleeWeapon("wooden_sword"))
	.addItem(new Medicament("small_life_potion", 4))
	.shuffle();

/*  
 *  Following final parameters are available to use:
 *  here: MapPin - the composite object containing current map UID, 
 *        layer's index and x,y coordinates of the current tile          
 *  x: int - the x coordinate of the current tile
 *  y: int - the y coordinate of the current tile

 *  map: GameMap - current map          
 *  handler: HeroHomeHandler - current map handler
 *  runner: DemoRunner - the game runner of the project
 *  context: Context - the game context
 */
chest(here, "enforced_chest_left")
	.addItem(new MeleeWeapon("wooden_sword"))
	.addItem(new Medicament("small_life_potion", 4))
	.shuffle();
